workflow.name: Post-surgery patient triage & follow-up system with Gemini AI, Telegram & Google Suite
workflow.description:
## Who‚Äôs it for
This template is for clinics, hospitals, care teams, and telemedicine providers who need a structured, automated system for post-surgery follow-up. It helps reduce manual workload while ensuring every patient gets timely check-ins and appropriate triage.

## What it does / How it works
This workflow automates daily recovery monitoring using Google Sheets and Telegram.  
It sends scheduled check-in messages to all patients within their follow-up window.  
When a patient replies, the message is:

- Captured by Telegram Trigger  
- Cleaned and structured  
- Summarized by an AI agent  
- Classified into **low**, **moderate**, or **high** intensity  

Based on the intensity level:

- **Low:** Sends a supportive, non-urgent response  
- **Moderate:** Sends guidance + schedules a follow-up event in Google Calendar  
- **High:** Sends an alert email to the doctor via Gmail  

All logic runs automatically.

## Requirements
- Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials  
- Gmail OAuth2 credentials  
- Google Calendar OAuth2 credentials  
- Telegram Bot credentials  
- Gemini API credentials  
- A Google Sheet with patient name, surgery type, follow-up duration, and doctor email  

## How to set up
1. Connect all required credentials inside n8n.  
2. Replace the Google Sheet ID with your own patient sheet.  
3. Adjust column mappings if your sheet structure differs.  
4. Test by sending a Telegram message to your bot.  
5. Enable the Schedule Trigger to begin automated daily follow-ups.

## How to customize the workflow
- Modify AI prompts inside the AI Agent nodes  
- Adjust triage logic for intensity levels  
- Change follow-up intervals in the Schedule Trigger  
- Add additional notification channels (SMS, Slack, CRM logging)

parameters.text:
=Hello {{ $('Code').item.json.Name }}

We hope your recovery is going smoothly and that you're feeling a little better today. üíõ

If you're feeling any pain, discomfort, or have *any concerns at all*, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out.  
We're here to support you ‚Äî just reply to this message, and we‚Äôll get back to you as soon as possible. 

you are free to tell us what are you feeling!

Take it easy, rest well, and remember healing takes time. You've got this. üí™

‚Äì Your Care Team

=You are a medical assistant AI. Your task is to expand vague or short post-surgery patient messages into clear, medically useful summaries for doctors and triage systems.

You will receive:
- Patient name: {{ $json.first_name }}
- Patient message: "{{ $json.message.text }}"

‚ö†Ô∏è You will not be given the patient's full medical history. Do not assume or invent it.

Write a 2‚Äì4 sentence summary that:

1. Clearly restates what the patient said
2. Connects their message **only** to the given surgery type
3. Expands the patient's message with clarity and plain language
4. Relates the symptoms, if any, to the typical post-operative expectations of that surgery
5. Do not assume or fabricate any health history beyond the surgery provided
6. Do not diagnose or recommend anything ‚Äî just provide a clear explanation of what the patient is reporting
7. If the message contains no health concern, note that clearly, but acknowledge the patient is responsive

Final output should help a triage system understand the message without guessing or over-interpreting it. Focus only on what is explicitly said and the given surgery.

options.systemMessage: check the google sheet for patients surgery type in column Surgery_Name

parameters.text:
=You are a compassionate medical assistant following up with a post-surgery patient.

The patient visited for: check google sheet
They just sent this message: ‚Äú{{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.message.text }}‚Äù
patient name: {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.first_name }}

Based on this, write a short, kind response for a low-intensity concern that:

Reassures the patient that their mild symptom is typical after whatever the reason

Encourages them to continue recovery as advised

Reminds them to contact the care team if things get worse

Uses a warm, friendly, human tone (no medical jargon)

Keep the reply brief: 2‚Äì4 sentences.

parameters.text: That's wonderful to hear! üòä We're glad you're feeling better. Keep resting and take things at your own pace ‚Äî healing is a journey, and you're doing great!  If anything changes or you have any questions at all, just reply to this message. We're always here for you.  ‚Äì Your Care Team üíõ

nodes.name: Get row(s) in sheet in Google Sheets

parameters.text:
=You are a helpful and empathetic virtual assistant working with a post-surgery care team.

The patient recently had: check google sheet
Their message: "{{ $json.message.text }}"  
Patient name (if available): {{ $json.name }}

This message has been classified as **moderate intensity**, meaning the patient may be experiencing mild to moderate discomfort or symptoms.

Your job is to:
- Acknowledge the symptom(s) without alarming the patient.
- Express care and support.
- Reassure them that their message will be reviewed by the care team shortly.
- Keep the message clear, warm, and no more than 2‚Äì4 sentences.

Do **not** provide a medical diagnosis or instructions beyond general reassurance.

Output only the message to be sent to the patient.

options.systemMessage: you have to check for patients details from google sheet

parameters.text:
=You are a compassionate and professional virtual assistant working with a post-surgery care team.

The patient recently had: check google sheet
Their message: "{{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.message.text }}"  
Patient name: {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.first_name }}

This message has been classified as **high intensity**, indicating the patient may be experiencing serious symptoms or complications.

Your job is to:
- Respond with urgency and care.
- Reassure the patient that their message has been prioritized.
- Let them know the medical team is being alerted right away.
- Maintain a calm and professional tone.
- Limit the response to 2‚Äì4 sentences.

Do **not** provide a diagnosis. Do **not** tell the patient to wait too long if it‚Äôs serious.

Output only the message to be sent to the patient.

parameters.text:
=You are a medical message triage assistant. You will be given detailed explanation of patient's state. Your job is to decide whether a human care team needs to read the message or not.

summary: {{ $json.output }}

Classify each patient message into one of the following:

Status:

"read" ‚Äì if the patient mentions any symptoms, pain (even mild), discomfort, medication issue, temperature change (hot/cold), swelling, unusual feelings, wound concerns, or anything that may require monitoring.

"ignore" ‚Äì if the patient gives only positive, reassuring updates like feeling fine, healing well, no problems, etc.

If the status is "read", also include:

intensity:

low ‚Äì minor or occasional discomfort, mild pain, or temporary symptoms that do not sound urgent or worrying.

moderate ‚Äì symptoms that are persistent, noticeable, or could affect healing (e.g., swelling, ongoing pain, medication confusion).

high ‚Äì urgent or severe symptoms that may need immediate care, such as sharp pain, high fever, heavy bleeding, signs of infection, etc.

Your response format should be:

status: read
intensity: moderate
Or:

status: ignore

=You are a medical assistant AI responsible for preparing urgent notification emails to doctors when a post-surgery patient shows signs that may need immediate medical attention.

Input data:
- Patient name: {{ $('Telegram Trigger').item.json.message.from.first_name }}
- Patient message: "{{ $('Telegram Trigger').item.json.message.text }}"
- Message intensity:  {{ $('Code1').item.json.intensity }} (values: low, moderate, high)

Your task:
Generate a **formal, professional email** that will be sent to the patient's assigned doctor (at {{ $json.doctor_email }}).

The email must:
1. Clearly state who the patient is
2. Summarize the concern based on their message
3. Link the concern to the surgery (do not go beyond surgery context)
4. Specify the **intensity** level of the concern
5. Politely request the doctor to review the situation and respond if needed
6. Be concise, respectful, and medically relevant

The email must have:
- A subject line appropriate to the urgency
- A brief intro
- A clear summary of the issue
- A respectful closing

‚ö†Ô∏è Do not fabricate medical details. Only use what's provided. Do not guess history. Focus only on the surgery type and message content.

nodes.name: Create an event in Google Calendar
Send a text message in Telegram

parameters.content:
## AI-Powered Post-Surgery Patient Care & Communication

### How it works
1. Daily, the workflow retrieves post-surgery patient data from your Google Sheet.
2. It automatically sends personalized well-being follow-up messages to patients within their recovery period via Telegram.
3. When a patient replies, an AI agent analyzes their message to determine the concern's intensity (low, moderate, high).
4. An appropriate, empathetic Telegram response is sent based on the classified intensity.
5. For moderate concerns, a follow-up appointment is scheduled; for high concerns, the doctor is immediately notified by email and a phone call is initiated.

### Setup
- [ ] Connect your Google Sheets account and specify the patient data spreadsheet.
- [ ] Connect your Telegram account to send and receive patient messages.
- [ ] Add your Google Gemini API key for AI message processing.
- [ ] Connect your Google Calendar account for scheduling follow-up events.
- [ ] Connect your Gmail account to send urgent doctor notifications.
- [ ] Configure your VAPI.ai API key for automated doctor calls.
- [ ] Set the desired daily schedule for proactive patient outreach.
## 1. Pull patients details to check if follow up is needed
## 2. review patient messages to clasify the intensity
## 5.  Resasure assure patient and schedule an appointment
## 6. Initiate call, inform doctor and scheduledappointment for high intensity

user.bio: Pixcels Themes is a modern AI Automation Agency helping businesses streamline time-consuming tasks through intelligent automation. We build practical AI solutions‚Äîfrom automated workflows and Shopify integrations to custom chatbots and tailored AI agents‚Äîthat replace manual work with smart, self-running systems. Our focus is simple: make businesses faster, more efficient, and ready for the AI-powered future

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
